remark.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部四年級可選修。

goal.en: In this class, we will understand the physical and transport characteristics of deep/sub-micron devices or even nanometer electronic components, and then analyze or design deep sub-micron or nanometer electronic components.
goal.ch: 了解深次微米甚或奈米電子元件的物理與傳輸特性，進而得以分析或設計深次微米或奈米電子元件。

content.en:
- Introduction
- Quantitative Analysis for MOS Capacitor
- Long-Channel MOSFETs
- Short-Channel MOSFETs
- MOSFET Scaling and Design
- SOI CMOS
- Other topics"
content.ch:
- Introduction
- Quantitative Analysis for MOS Capacitor
- Long-Channel MOSFETs
- Short-Channel MOSFETs
- MOSFET Scaling and Design
- SOI CMOS
- Other topics"

textbook.en: "Yuan Taur and Tak H. Ning, ""Fundamentals of modern VLSI devices"" Ben G. Streetman and Sanjay Kumar Banerjee, “Solid State Electronic Devices” Chenming Hu, “Modern Semiconductor Devices for Integrated Circuits”"
textbook.ch: "Yuan Taur and Tak H. Ning, ""Fundamentals of modern VLSI devices"" Ben G. Streetman and Sanjay Kumar Banerjee, “Solid State Electronic Devices” Chenming Hu, “Modern Semiconductor Devices for Integrated Circuits”"

method.ch: 講授 研討 個別指導

flex_desc.en: Leaves two weeks for the final project
flex_desc.ch: 剩下兩周讓學生們做最後的期末作業。
